meanings.definition: Lacking social grace, sensitivity, or tact; awkward; crude.
meanings.sent1: She felt gauchest at the fancy dinner party, unsure of which fork to use.
meanings.sent2: His gauchest attempt at dancing drew a few chuckles from the crowd.
meanings.sent3: Despite his gauchest behavior, he always managed to make people smile.
meanings.sent4: Her gauchest jokes landed with a thud, but she laughed at her own humor.
meanings.sent5: The gauchest moment of the evening was when he spilled his drink on the hostess.

meanings.sent1: The gauchest boy in class always wore mismatched socks.
meanings.sent2: She felt gauchest when she tripped over her own shoelaces in front of everyone.
meanings.sent3: His gauchest outfit choice for the party was a neon green suit.
meanings.sent4: The gauchest dancer at the talent show moved like a robot with two left feet.
meanings.sent5: The gauchest moment of the play was when the actor forgot his lines and froze on stage.
